name: after-dark
description: A retro dark theme for Hugo.

scripts.posttag: git tag --sign $(git describe --tags $(git rev-list --tags --max-count=1)) $(git describe --tags $(git rev-list --tags --max-count=1))^{} -f -m "$(git log -1 --pretty=%B)" -m "-----BEGIN DIST INTEGRITY-----" -m "$(npm pack --dry-run --json . | grep integrity | cut -d ',' -f1 | cut -d ':' -f2 | tr -d '" ')" -m "-----END DIST INTEGRITY-----"

scripts.update:lazysizes: pnpm up lazysizes && cp -i node_modules/lazysizes/lazysizes.min.js static/js
scripts.update:fuse: pnpm up fuse.js && cp -i node_modules/fuse.js/dist/fuse.js static/js/fuse.min.js
scripts.update:vue: pnpm up vue && cp -i node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js static/js
scripts.update:mark: pnpm up mark.js && cp -i node_modules/mark.js/dist/mark.min.js static/js
scripts.update:hackcss: pnpm up hackcss && cp -ir node_modules/hack/dist/ assets/css/vendor/hack/
scripts.test: while true; do head -n 100 /dev/urandom; sleep 0.1; done | hexdump -C | grep 'ca fe'
scripts.integrity: pnpm pack --dry-run --json . | grep integrity | cut -d ',' -f1 | cut -d ':' -f2 | tr -d '" '
